data.name:
Weathering the Storm:
Financial Services in the New Normal
data.summary:
This online panel will focus on how successful organizations weather the storm: delivering quality financial services in the new normal.
Some critical questions that will be answered:
How would the IT infrastructure scale and manage these demands? How do we ensure a minimum of downtime?
As digital delivery increases, so does the possibility of security risks. What can we do to protect our clients’ data and our organizations’ integrity?
The ecosystem expansion challenge increases the need for scalability and security without downtime. Can we deliver on that promise?
